typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		{ID de caso} as string,
		{Fecha de notificación} as string,
		{Codigo DIVIPOLA} as string,
		{Ciudad de ubicación} as string,
		{Departamento o Distrito } as string,
		{atención} as string,
		Edad as string,
		Sexo as string,
		Tipo as string,
		Estado as string,
		{País de procedencia} as string,
		FIS as string,
		{Fecha de muerte} as string,
		{Fecha diagnostico} as string,
		{Fecha recuperado} as string,
		{fecha reporte web} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> mainFile
source(output(
		Edad as integer,
		surr_edad as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> TableEdad
source(output(
		Estado as string,
		surr_estado as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> TableEstado
source(output(
		Departamento as string,
		surr_depto as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> TableDepto
source(output(
		original as string,
		fixeddepartment as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> FixedDepto
mainFile select(mapColumn(
		Departamento = {Departamento o Distrito },
		Edad,
		Estado
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> ColumnsOfInterest
ColumnsOfInterest, TableEdad join(toInteger(ColumnsOfInterest@Edad) == TableEdad@Edad,
	joinType:'cross',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> JoinEdad
JoinEdad select(mapColumn(
		Departamento,
		Estado,
		surr_edad
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> RemovingExtraEdad
RemovingExtraEdad, TableEstado join(RemovingExtraEdad@Estado == TableEstado@Estado,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> JoinEstado
JoinEstado select(mapColumn(
		Departamento,
		surr_edad,
		surr_estado
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> RemovingExtraEstado
SelectAndChangeName, TableDepto join(SelectAndChangeName@Departamento == TableDepto@Departamento,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> JoinDepto
JoinDepto select(mapColumn(
		surr_edad,
		surr_estado,
		surr_depto
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> RemovingExtraDepto
RemovingExtraEstado, FixedDepto join(Departamento == original,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> FixedDeptos
FixedDeptos select(mapColumn(
		surr_edad,
		surr_estado,
		Departamento = fixeddepartment
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectAndChangeName
RemovingExtraDepto sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	recreate:true,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> SaveFactTable
